content.text:
[@PinkMoff](@LMkiSqWlqiGPsGErLq5PphsduuN4d5tkmUO0+lcgBlM=.ed25519)

Could you post the output of ` env | grep -iE '(node|npm)'` and `npm version` please? Alternatively if you post build errors to the AUR package lots of people (including me) who use the package will get a notification that you're looking for help with it. :~)

[@mix](@ye+QM09iPcDJD6YvQYjoQc7sLF/IFhmNbEqgdzQo3lQ=.ed25519) 

Yeah, Arch has maintainers create their own repo for *only* the Arch-package-specific stuff, so it's a different git repo. I've considered pushing the repos to ssbc/aur-patchbay or something but wasn't sure if anyone would find it helpful. Maybe that would be a good move?
